config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The 'haltOnError' configuration option is checked in the code to determine if the system should be halted when an error occurs. If 'haltOnError' is true, the system will be canceled, the thread pool will be shut down, and the callback will be triggered with the error flag set to true.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The 'haltOnError' configuration is triggered whenever an exception is encountered in the system. It is triggered based on the result of the job and the value of 'haltOnError' in the arguments.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the 'haltOnError' configuration option is significant as it can halt the system when an error occurs. This can affect the overall processing and completion of jobs in the system, potentially leading to incomplete or failed tasks.
